resources.string: 60. Al-Mumtahina (She that is to be examined)
The Reader: Muhammad Al Luhaidan\nTranslated into Russian by Elmir Kuliyev

1. Allah (The One God)
 2. Ar-Rahman (The Most Gracious to all in this world)
 3. Ar-Rahim (The Most Merciful to believers in the hereafter)
 4. Al-Malik (The Sovereign of all)
 5. Al-Quddus (Free from defects)
 6. As-Salam (The Giver of peace and safety to His creations)
 7. Al-Mu'min (The Giver of security and trust to His faithful servants)
 8. Al-Muhaymin (The Guardian)
 9. Al-Aziz (The Almighty, The Invincible)
 10. Al-Jabbar (The Compeller, The Restorer)
 11. Al-Mutakabbir (The Sole Possessor of Glory)
 12. Al-Khaliq (The Creator)
 13. Al-Bari' (The Evolver, The Fashioner)
 14. Al-Musawwir (The Fashioner of forms)
 15. Al-Ghaffar (The Constant Forgiver)
 16. Al-Kahhar (The All-Prevailing One)
 17. Al-Wahhab (The Supreme Bestower)
 18. Ar-Razzaq (The Provider)
 19. Al-Fattah (The Opener of Goodness)
 20. Al-'Alim (The All-Knowing)
 21. Al-Qabid (The Withholder)
 22. Al-Basit (The Extender)
 23. Al-Hafid (The Reducer)
 24. Ar-Rafi' (The Exalter)
 25. Al-Mu'izz (The Honourer)
 26. Al-Mudhill (The Dishonourer)
 27. As-Sami' (The All-Hearing)
 28. Al-Basir (The All-Seeing)
 29. Al-Hakam (The Impartial Judge)
 30. Al-'Adl (The Utterly Just)
 31. Al-Latif (The Subtle One)
 32. Al-Khabir (The All-Aware)
 33. Al-Halim (The Forbearing)
 34. Al-'Azim (The Magnificent)
 35. Al-Ghafur (The Great Forgiver)
 36. Ash-Shakur (The Most Appreciative)
 37. Al-'Aliy (The Most High, The Exalted)
 38. Al-Kabir (The Most Great)
 39. Al-Hafiz (The Preserver)
 40. Al-Muqit (The Sustainer)
 41. Al-Hasib (The Reckoner)
 42. Al-Jalil (The Majestic)
 43. Al-Karim (The Generous)
 44. Ar-Raqib (The Watchful)
 45. Al-Mujib (The Responsive One)
 46. Al-Wasi' (The All-Encompassing)
 47. Al-Hakim (The All-Wise)
 48. Al-Wadud (The Most Loving)
 49. Al-Majid (The Glorious)
 50. Al-Ba'ith (The Resurrector)
 51. Ash-Shahid (The Witness)
 52. Al-Haqq (The Absolute Truth)
 53. Al-Wakil (The Trustee)
 54. Al-Qawiyy (The All-Strong)
 55. Al-Matin (The Firm, The Steadfast)
 56. Al-Waliyy (The Protecting Associate)
 57. Al-Hamid (The Praiseworthy)
 58. Al-Muhsi (The All-Enumerating)
 59. Al-Mubdi' (The Originator)
 60. Al-Mu'id (The Restorer)
 61. Al-Muhyi (The Giver of Life)
 62. Al-Mumit (The Creator of Death)
 63. Al-Hayy (The Ever-Living)
 64. Al-Qayyum (The Sustainer)
 65. Al-Wajid (The Perceiver)
 66. Al-Majid (The Illustrious)
 67. Al-Wahid (The One)
 68. As-Samad (The Eternal)
 69. Al-Qadir (The Omnipotent)
 70. Al-Muqtadir (The Powerful)
 71. Al-Muqaddim (The Expediter)
 72. Al-Mu'akhkhir (The Delayer)
 73. Al-Awwal (The First)
 74. Al-Akhir (The Last)
 75. Az-Zahir (The Manifest)
 76. Al-Batin (The Hidden)
 77. Al-Wali (The Sole Ruler)
 78. Al-Muta'ali (The Self Exalted)
 79. Al-Bar (The Source of All Goodness)
 80. At-Tawwab (The Ever-Pardoning)
 81. Al-Muntaqim (The Avenging)
 82. Al-'Afuww (The Pardoner)
 83. Ar-Ra'uf (The Most Kind)
 84. Al-Malikul-Mulk (The Master of the Kingdom)
 85. Dhul-Jalali wal-Ikram (The Lord of Glory and Honour)
 86. Al-Muqsit (The Just)
 87. Al-Jami' (The Gatherer, The Uniter)
 88. Al-Ghaniyy (The Self-Sufficient)
 89. Al-Mughni (The Enricher)
 90. Al-Mani' (The Withholder)
 91. Ad-Darr (The Distresser)
 92. An-Nafi' (The Propitious)
 93. An-Nur (The Light)
 94. Al-Hadi (The Guide)
 95. Al-Badi' (The Incomparable)
 96. Al-Baqi (The Ever-Surviving)
 97. Al-Waris (The Inheritor)
 98. Ar-Rashid (The Guide to the Right Path)
 99. As-Sabur (The Patient)
